hero.title: Chargify
hero.subtitle: Authorized Agent for 1xbet
hero.description: We provide you with fast and reliable recharge and withdrawal with your ID, supporting all Moroccan banks and even home delivery service. 24/7 live support to keep you always comfortable.

features.startToday: Chargify is an authorized agent for the 1xbet platform, offering fast recharge and withdrawal, supporting all Moroccan banks and even home delivery.

questions.question: What do I need to recharge?
How do I receive my money?
questions.answer: Via bank transfer or cash delivered to your home.

questions.question: Do I need a bank account to benefit?
questions.answer: No, you can also use cash and home delivery service.

questions.question: How long does recharge or withdrawal take?
questions.answer: Usually 3 to 5 minutes only, speed is always guaranteed.

questions.question: What payment methods does Chargify offer?
questions.answer: Bank transfer, cash on delivery, or as agreed.

questions.question: Can I recharge any amount?
questions.answer: Yes, flexible, but there is a minimum and maximum agreed in advance.

questions.question: How do I know my transaction succeeded?
questions.answer: You receive instant confirmation via WhatsApp + a screenshot of the operation.

questions.question: Are there any extra fees?
questions.answer: Our fees are very low and always communicated upfront.
